cluster_classes.class_description: Cultural elements of Germany, including the overall culture and its orally transmitted narrative traditions that the Grimms sought to preserve.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: to preserve the oral traditions of their culture ... German culture

members.entity_description: Cultural stories and tales passed down verbally across generations in German society.
The cultural context whose oral traditions the Grimm brothers sought to preserve.

cluster_classes.class_description: Conceptual and cultural domains related to the background and transmission of fairytales, including folklore and the historical origins of famous tales.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Both reference folklore and cultural beginnings underlying the origins and transmission of fairytales.

members.entity_description: Traditional beliefs, stories, and customs shared within a culture that influence or shape the origins and transmission of fairytales.
The historical and cultural beginnings of well-known fairytales, often rooted in oral traditions, folklore, and cultural myths.

args.new_name: German Cultural Heritage and Oral Traditions
args.new_description: Cultural elements of Germany, focusing on German culture and its orally transmitted narrative traditions that the Grimms sought to preserve.
args.justification: This class specifically covers German culture and its oral narrative heritage within the broader domain of folklore and fairy-tale traditions; assigning a precise Class_Group and slightly refining the label/description clarifies its scope and connects it to related folklore classes.

args.new_description: Conceptual and cultural domains related to folklore and the historical origins and transmission of fairytales, including traditional beliefs, stories, and customs.
args.justification: This class covers general folklore and the origins of famous fairytales and should be grouped with related cultural-heritage classes under a shared Folklore and Fairy-Tale Traditions Class_Group; refining the label and description makes its conceptual focus clearer and complementary to the German-specific class.

executed_decisions.new_name: German Cultural Heritage and Oral Traditions

executed_decisions.justification: This class specifically covers German culture and its oral narrative heritage within the broader domain of folklore and fairy-tale traditions; assigning a precise Class_Group and slightly refining the label/description clarifies its scope and connects it to related folklore classes.

executed_decisions.justification: This class covers general folklore and the origins of famous fairytales and should be grouped with related cultural-heritage classes under a shared Folklore and Fairy-Tale Traditions Class_Group; refining the label and description makes its conceptual focus clearer and complementary to the German-specific class.
